text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Hydration levels, heart rate, and blood<n>pressure have all
stabilized.<n>Maintenance complete.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Thank you for your assistance. I will<n>take my leave now.
choice_data_list: Hey, are you sure you're okay?
Hey, are you sure you're okay?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Affirmative. My database shows that<n>losing consciousness
is expected<n>after high levels of exertion. I am<n>currently
taking appropriate<n>countermeasures.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
By current projections, I will have<n>sufficient energy to
resume activity in<n>7 minutes and 28 seconds. I will<n>
continue regulating my breath until<n>then.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I get the uneasy sense "resumeactivity" means she's planning toresume training.
choice_data_list:
Once you feel better, you're going back home...
right?

Once you feel better, you're going back home...
right?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Negative. There are 2,000 meters<n>remaining that I must run.
choice_data_list: Absolutely not!
Absolutely not!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Why?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I explain to her the importance of<n>gradually building
endurance. Taking<n>on long-distance training too early can<n>
cause injuries.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Acknowledged. However, I have a<n>goal I must achieve.
choice_data_list: What goal?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: The Classic Triple Crown.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The Classic Triple Crown—a series of<n>medium- and
long-distance G1 races<n>consisting of the Satsuki Sho,<n>
Japanese Derby, and Kikuka Sho.
choice_data_list: (Hm... Hang on...)

text_block_list.name: Skilled Trainer
text_block_list.text:
I'm surprised you didn't know. That<n>trainer's been gushing
about how<n>he'll make Bourbon the perfect<n>sprinter.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
If Mihono Bourbon's trainer is<n>prepping her for short
distances, why<n>is she here alone practicing for the<n>Classic
Triple Crown?
choice_data_list: Does your trainer know what you're doing?
Does your trainer know what you're doing?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Well...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
According to the Twinkle Series<n>database, you have attained
wins in<n>26 graded races. Your skill in handling<n>medium-
and long-distance races is<n>evident.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I would like your assistance in helping<n>me train for the
Classic Triple Crown.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text:
I hate to break it to you but... you're<n>just not cut out for long
distances. You<n>already know that, right?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Correct. My base specifications are<n>compatible with sprints.
However, I<n>believe that I can increase my<n>stamina.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text: There's a big chance you'd wind up<n>getting hurt.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Your concern is unnecessary. My<n>father was a trainer, so I
have run<n>exhaustive routines since youth. In<n>other words,
I am used to it.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text: Sigh...

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Don't get distracted by unrealistic<n>goals. If you stick to what
you're<n>good at, you'll get a lot farther.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: In conclusion, he rejected my<n>proposal.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I issued two other messages in an<n>attempt to reach an
agreement.<n>Unfortunately, I was met with silence.
choice_data_list: (...I get where he's coming from though.)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I saw for myself how good a sprinter<n>Mihono Bourbon is. It
feels like a<n>waste of talent...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: However, my objective remains the<n>Classic Triple Crown.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I compiled a training regimen to<n>customize my specifications
for<n>endurance.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I intend to win a race of at least<n>medium distance, and
present<n>empirical data to my trainer in further<n>negotiations.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The ambitious trainee's commitment<n>to her cause is clear,
but I can't shake<n>off the feeling that she'll run herself<n>into
danger.
choice_data_list:
Before we do anything rash, let's talk to your
train—

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
7 minutes and 30 seconds have<n>elapsed. My body is now
stable.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I will resume training. Goodbye.
choice_data_list: W-wait!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Without wasting a moment, the<n>student speeds off again
into the<n>night.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
(1,200 meters completed. Estimated<n>time of arrival at goal
exceeds target.<n>Accelerating tempo.)

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Agh!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Even from afar, I can see Mihono<n>Bourbon struggling to run.
choice_data_list: (I can't just stand here and do nothing!)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I know I shouldn't contradict her<n>trainer's guidance, but... I
rush over to<n>help Bourbon.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Ahh... hah...
choice_data_list: ...Pay attention to your lap time.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Lap time?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I carefully explain the importance of<n>pacing. Managing
one's stamina is<n>crucial, especially during extended<n>
races.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Reminding Mihono Bourbon of her<n>analytical prowess, I
suggest that she<n>uses it to recalculate her time and<n>
distance while running.
choice_data_list: If you do that, I'm sure you'll improve.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
...Understood. Updating my database<n>accordingly. After I
recover, I will begin<n>my measurements.
choice_data_list:
Sounds good. Why don't we start with 1,600
meters for now?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: But—
choice_data_list: There's no need to rush.
There's no need to rush.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
...Affirmative. Adjusting speed<n>parameters to match a
"relaxed"<n>tempo. Commencing new training<n>program.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
(400 meters completed according to<n>schedule. Increasing
distance to 600<n>meters. Prioritizing lap time.)

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: (Air intake regulation... confirmed.)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And with those changes, Mihono<n>Bourbon safely completes
1,600<n>meters.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...Adding personal best to my<n>database.
choice_data_list: That was awesome! Congrats!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Without thinking, I start clapping my<n>hands to celebrate
Mihono Bourbon's<n>new record. She stares at me in<n>
response, her face completely<n>expressionless.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
choice_data_list: ...What's wrong?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...Emotional status displays<n>characteristics of "happiness."

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Your advice has been invaluable. I am<n>certain this brings me
one step closer<n>to the Triple Crown.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Despite her seemingly stoic look, I<n>can't help but notice a
tiny smile<n>forming around the corners of her<n>lips.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
From that moment on, nightly trips to<n>the racecourse
become routine as I<n>keep a close eye on Mihono Bourbon<n>
to ensure her safety.
